update PRODUCT set PUTAWAY_DATE = #{putawayDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, KINDS = #{kinds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCT_NAME = #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCT_IMAGE_URL = #{productImageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PRODUCT_TYPES = #{productTypes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCER = #{producer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCRIBED = #{described,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCTION_DATE = #{productionDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PRICE = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DISCOUNT_PRICE = #{discountPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, IS_DISCOUNT = #{isDiscount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LIMIT_NUMBER = #{limitNumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, KIND_NUMBER = #{kindNumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, START_DATE = #{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, END_DATE = #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CARRIAGE = #{carriage,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, IS_GROUP_BUY = #{isGroupBuy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, GROUP_BUY_PRICE = #{groupBuyPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, GROUP_BUY_PERSON_NUMBER = #{groupBuyPersonNumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, START_GROUP_BUY_DATE = #{startGroupBuyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, END_GROUP_BUY_DATE = #{endGroupBuyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, KEY_CLASS = #{keyClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BIG_KEY_CLASS = #{bigKeyClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, KEYWORD = #{keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM product WHERE ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT ID,KEY_CLASS,PRODUCT_IMAGE_URL FROM product WHERE BIG_KEY_CLASS = #{bigKeyClass} and PRICE = 0
SELECT * FROM product WHERE KEY_CLASS = #{keyClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and PRICE != 0
select DISTINCT BIG_KEY_CLASS from PRODUCT WHERE PRICE = 0
SELECT DISTINCT KEY_CLASS FROM PRODUCT WHERE BIG_KEY_CLASS = #{bigKeyClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and KEY_CLASS != 'string'
SELECT * FROM PRODUCT WHERE KEYWORD = '扶뒬못'
SELECT ID,PRODUCT_IMAGE_URL FROM PRODUCT WHERE KEYWORD = '扶뒬못'
SELECT * FROM PRODUCT where IS_DISCOUNT = 1
SELECT * FROM PRODUCT WHERE IS_GROUP_BUY = 1
SELECT * FROM (select * from PRODUCT order by PUTAWAY_DATE) WHERE rownum <=6 and PRODUCT_NAME != 'string'
SELECT ID FROM PRODUCT
SELECT * FROM PRODUCT WHERE ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and PRODUCT_NAME != 'string'
SELECT ID FROM PRODUCT
